channel.title: Adding animation
channel.description: well i got this custom gun tht i have in my server and i wanna add animation like karils cbow nd make it use bullets like the cross bow does any help cuz all this custom does is sit there and not move

item.title: Adding animation
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

I forgot what file to go in to add animation but i have animation list. 0427 is for shooting with a crossbow. if you need any other animations,gfxs,npc ids,item ids, or anything just private message me.

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

Search item number of karils bow…Copy it and paste it…Replace the gun’s number with karils bow everytime it shows up
